name: The Physics World
description:
In this game, there are three levels. The first two levels were developed using physics without unity functions or collisions. The last level uses unity engine physics in a fun and Christmas spirit form.

Christmas Ball Bounce - Santa dropped a couple of unique balls while delivering gifts. Race to the end with different gravities. Who will win? 

Driving With Santa - Enjoy Santa's ride that takes you around a small town, going from present to present.

Presents Delivery -Santa's Reinders have broken loose; however, three last presents need to be delivered. 

Help Santa deliver the last presents. However, be aware that the Slay requires magical fuel. 

Running out of fuel will lead to Santa's slay falling. Hitting any obstacles will reduce the power.

Controls : 

W / Space -Thrusters to push slay Up.
A / D - Thrusters to push slay to the left or right.

Game developed for "Maths and Physics for Games", year 2,  coursework.
